name: Cough Syrup (Sugar-Free)
description: Non-drowsy, sugar-free cough syrup for relief from dry coughs and throat irritation.

name: Paracetamol 500mg Tablet
description: Used for reducing fever and relieving mild to moderate pain.

name: Azithromycin 250mg
description: Used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.

name: Levocetirizine 5mg
description: Helps relieve allergy symptoms like runny nose and sneezing.

description: Used to treat various types of infections caused by bacteria.

name: Pantoprazole 40mg
description: Used to treat acid reflux and ulcers.

name: Ibuprofen 400mg
description: Reduces inflammation and pain in the body.

name: Cetirizine 10mg
description: Used for treating allergies and hay fever.

name: Metformin 500mg
description: Helps control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

name: Telmisartan 40mg
description: Used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension).

name: Atorvastatin 10mg
description: Used to lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
